"I think this could be Trump's final play to throw Israel and neocons off his back, he's like fine I'll go full team neocons, basically lighting a huge fire that has everyone mad and he'll basically destroy that whole line of the party as they're now seeing the backlash and then he'll reverse course. Hopefully I'm right otherwise it's the end of America."
It's not much hope, but hey. permalink award report block reply ACActual OP 5 points 5 hours ago Copium.
